TopicTitle: Heat Shields (Need help finding an old mod)

Articles.Content:
Hello kerbanauts! As the title suggests I am at my wits end and could use some help finding an old mod. Specifically a mod containing several heat shields of many different sizes and styles.

First let me say that the heat shields I am referring to were not and are not in the DRE (deadly reentry) mod. These were a standalone heat shield mod pack containing a variety of of shields of different sizes and styles. Some of the heat shields were inflatable, others had extendable metal blades/fins that were designed to dissipate heat when fully extended. I believe they were compatible with DRE (the deadly reentry plugin), but as far as I remember they were a standalone pack.

I would appreciate any and all information about this mod, even if it's just to tell me that it was abandoned by it's author/creator and can no longer be found. That way I can stop pulling my hair out and give up the search lol!

Welcome!

Are you thinking of Planetes Co Heatshields? I think they were by Yorik, you can try PMing her/him.
